ancestry: html > body > main:nth-child(8) > div:nth-child(2) > div > h1:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(9) > footer:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(9) > footer:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(9) > footer:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div:nth-child(3) > div > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(23) > div:nth-child(7) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(23) > div:nth-child(7) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(2) > h3
